tool.name: Upload
tool.command: upload.py $GALAXY_ROOT_DIR $GALAXY_DATATYPES_CONF_FILE $paramfile #set $outnum = 0 #while $varExists('output%i' % $outnum): #set $output = $getVar('output%i' % $outnum) #set $outnum += 1 #set $file_name = $output.file_name ## FIXME: This is not future-proof for other uses of external_filename (other than for use by the library upload's "link data" feature) #if $output.dataset.dataset.external_filename: #set $file_name = "None" #end if ${output.dataset.dataset.id}:${output.files_path}:${file_name} #end while

options.transform_lines: [ "%s%s%s" % ( line, self.separator, line ) for line in obj ]

param.name: file_data
param.label: File
param.help: TIP: Due to browser limitations, uploading files larger than 2GB is guaranteed to fail. To upload large files, use the URL method (below) or FTP (if enabled by the site administrator).

param.name: url_paste
param.label: URL/Text
param.help: Here you may specify a list of URLs (one per line) or paste the contents of a file.

param.name: space_to_tab
param.label: Convert spaces to tabs
param.help: Use this option if you are entering intervals by hand.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Enables upload of a local file or pasted data.
**Auto-detect**
This option applies to plain text as well as various formats used for genomic data.
**Other formats**
The drop-down menu enables recognition of the following formats:
1. **csv**: Tab delimited format (tabular) 2. **gate**: GATE XML (output from GATE) 3. **json**: Data in JSON format (e.g., data from PubAnnotation) 4. **lapps**: Data in a JSON-LD container including a ``discriminator`` with an undefined ``payload`` type 5. **lif**: Data in a JSON-LD container including a ``discriminator`` with ``payload`` type LIF (payload contains data in LIF format) 6. **liftxt**: Data in a JSON-LD container including a ``discriminator`` with ``payload`` type 'text' (payload contains plain text)
